MessageAsset.assetName: Correspondence between Drs Hornfels and Siltstone
MessageAsset.messageText:
Dear Dr Hornfels,

While I appreciate your concern with my recent project, I can assure you that the Lumen Extraction System (LES) is completely safe and will not cause undue stress on the mines. While we have yet to do a field test of the device, I have conducted adequate theoretical research to show there is no reasonable doubt towards my claims. I will be resubmitting Form 378-B for field testing approval tomorrow, with Senior Miner Picrite vouching for my claims.

In the meantime, perhaps consider making something yourself that works, rather than wasting time and resources on your little pet-project.

Sincerely,
Dr Coquina Siltstone, PhD.

Dear Dr Siltstone,

In the words of my erudite assistant Larimar, ‘That woman is not worth my hi-ho’. Your research is more porous than pumice, and as weighty as it too. If the committee shares even half a braincell between them, and Chert Picrite doesn’t poison their minds, they will see that your endeavours are entirely too dangerous, not to mention morally reprehensible.

I hope you perish in a fire, alongside every last one of your corrupt inventions.

Sincerely,
Dr Scoria Hornfels, PhD.
